name: hug me lion lovey
notes:
project level
easy

description
the hug me lion lovey is a beginner-friendly amigurumi lion security blanket. create a handmade, cuddly baby shower gift or the perfect addition to nursery decor. this crochet pattern is clear and easy to follow, and is great for beginners.

specifics
measurements: blanket approximately 13”x13”, lion approximately 4” tall with 5” arm span
gauge: not necessary for this pattern; see notes
hook size: 4.0mm (g) crochet hook, 5.0mm (h) crochet hook
other tools: tapestry needle, stitch markers, scissors
yarn weight: medium (4) worsted weight
yarn used: wecrochet/knit picks brava worsted
yardage: color a (yellow): 103 yds, color b (cream): 9 yds, color c (brown): 20 yds, color d (mint): 72 yds, color e (pink): 14 yds
other materials: poly-fil stuffing, 9mm safety eyes 


* pattern is written in standard us crochet terms.
